title: Heera Kanthi Haaram: Antique Polki Diamond Two-Layer Necklace
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds (approx. 20 carats total weight)
Hyderabadi Polish. Gold Weight: Approximately 80 grams.
features: This exquisite two-layer Haaram features meticulously set Polki diamonds in a closed setting, characteristic of traditional Mughal and Hyderabadi jewelry. The lower layer boasts delicate, teardrop-shaped diamond pendants, adding graceful movement. The gold framework is crafted with a subtle antique finish, enhancing the diamonds' brilliance. The graduating diamond sizes create a captivating visual flow.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali. Also suitable for grand parties and special events where you want to make a statement.
description: This Heera Kanthi Haaram is a timeless heirloom piece, handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad. The use of authentic Polki diamonds and the antique gold finish give it a regal and sophisticated look. It's a valuable investment and a symbol of enduring beauty. The two-layer design provides a substantial yet elegant presence. Owning this necklace is owning a piece of Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage.
